Texts.Chs: ......然而，更进一步的问题仍然存在：什么是黑星？ 它们为什么能在不产生任何真实光线的同时保持轨道和重力......并让它们的影响范围内的生命？ 这看上去没有任何意义，但必须——给它一个定义。 然而......传统物理学无法充分地解释它。 甚至邓舒布斯物质法则也不能完全适用于它们，事实上，时至今日这仍然是一个科学上的未解之谜。
Texts.Eng: ...The larger question still remains, however: What are Black Stars? How do they fail to generate any real light and yet maintain orbits and gravity...and allow for life in their sphere of influence? None of it makes any sense and there must be -some- sort of sense to it. And yet...conventional physics cannot adequately explain it. Not even Denshubbs Law of Matter can apply to them in full, a fact that still baffles science to this day.
